channel.title: Shop Help
channel.description:
1. When I make a shop, how am i susposed to know who's shop it will be? How do I make it belong to a certain person?
2. How come when I make a shop, and error accurs about what I put in the shop and it doesnt let me log in?
Please if you can, answer these questions!
-X SNIPER STUD X-[br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2007, 07:16:49 PM[/size][hr]Please??

item.description:

[quote=“X SNIPER STUD X, post:1, topic:55760”]1. When I make a shop, how am i susposed to know who’s shop it will be? How do I make it belong to a certain person?

  1. How come when I make a shop, and error accurs about what I put in the shop and it doesnt let me log in?

Please if you can, answer these questions!

-X SNIPER STUD X-[br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2007, 07:16:49 PM[/size][hr]Please??[/quote]
I can answer number 2. You did something wrong in the coding, or the thing you are adding to your server may not be made for the source you are using.
